title: How to set up Digital Wellbeing, Focus Mode, and Do Not Disturb on Pixel 6
content:
Digital Wellbeing with Focus Mode and Do Not Disturb on the Pixel 6 and 6 Pro is all about disconnecting when it matters. Taking a break here and there can be important, especially if you find yourself constantly distracted by what’s going on. Well, with Digital Wellbeing you can limit distractions without silencing the important things.

more…

The post How to set up Digital Wellbeing, Focus Mode, and Do Not Disturb on Pixel 6 appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Digital Wellbeing on the Pixel 6 has a lot of features like Focus Mode and Do Not Disturb. Here's how to enable them.
